channel.title: Making a forum
channel.description:
hey , well i need some help making a forum for my server , i already have an smfforfree2 but i need a 4 how do i ge that ?
or i would like to know how to make an .org forums
thanks alot

item.title: Making a forum
item.dc:creator: @Master_Programmer Master Programmer.
item.description:
@Master_Programmer wrote:

[quote=“endless hood, post:9, topic:228481”][quote author=Master Programmer. link=topic=300424.msg2411250#msg2411250 date=1219942234]

To make a .org you will need to download SMF and buy a Domain.

This is the wrong section too by the way:

RS2 Server Development/Help

It’s in the right section.

But I suggest using smfforfree as its quick and easy.

If you are looking to download themes, search on google, once you download it - go to admin control panel, theme section and mange and install themes.

Once its installed, set it as the default theme.
And if you would like to change things, edit it in the file you downloaded (the theme folder)

You can edit the banner etc

No, It’s in the wrong section.

This is about websites.

This forum is supposed to be about servers.
[/quote]

where am i suppose to ask then ? this would be the best place to put it any way seeing as it has got a “help” section[/quote]
Yes. Help of Rs2 Servers, Not Websites.
Most likely use the ‘Search’ Button?

Read full topic
